boat.name: Cachalot Jack
boat.full_description:
Commissioned on the birth of his first child, and named after grandfather Jack Holt, Cunard's choice Southampton Trinity House pilot and member of the Master Mariners club. The Club is called 'The Cachalots' after the whale as they had the thickest skins and spouted a lot!

'Cachalot Jack', the family boat, was intended to be the tender when times were flush and primary craft when things were tough or events dictated, but always loved.

Great fun in a small package which introduced the children to boating.
boat.short_description: A 13' dinghy, one of only six made, moulded by Hunter Boats, finished by Brian Mott, Cabin Boatyard, Bursledon and Andy Cunningham.
